PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-19162007-12-13,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FOOD AND DRUGS ACT (PROJECT 1539) which will exempt most non-prescription and natural health products from the general prohibition on the advertising and sale of a product to the general public as a preventative for any of the abnormal physical conditions referred to in Schedule A to the Act, but not as a treatment or cure for any of them.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0288 Publication Date: 2007-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FOOD AND DRUGS ACT (PROJECT 1539) which will exempt most non-prescription and natural health products from the general prohibition on the advertising and sale of a product to the general public as a preventative for any of the abnormal physical conditions referred to in Schedule A to the Act, but not as a treatment or cure for any of them.
